subject: Shipping information Netherlands
description_text:
Dear reader,

I'm looking to purchase the Simsonn Plus X pedals from your website.
However, I can't find any information on where the warehouse for shipping
to The Netherlands is located.

Are there any import fees I would have to consider if I purchased the
pedals from your website?

Thanks for your response.

Kind regards,
Rune Kolman

conversations.body_text: Hi Rune Kolman,  Our PlusX pedals are currently in stock at our German warehouse. We will ship directly from Germany, and no customs duties are required within the EU. You may add a note with your order: “Shipped from Germany.”
